allOf.description: Start allocating ports at this value, going upward

postmaster.description: Mail address to send technical mails to. Non-empty value required for smptd relay service to be deployed. Values will be put in alias-dict as 'postmaster' key (alias-dict takes precedence)

.*.description: List of addresses alias expands to

relay.description: Forward outgoing mails to a specific relay. If enabled, relay must support TLS-encrypted SASL authentication.

host.description: Host name or address of relay, with optional port (ex: '[example.com]:submission'). Enclosing hostname with [] prevents MX lookup.

sasl-credential.description: SASL credential, in the login:password form

divert.description: Intercept all mails and send them to given addresses instead of original recipient
